TopicTitle: Counting down the days: Day 4 - Resources

Articles.Content: Woo, cool!

And another 20:02 post!

Very *resourceful* of them to post everything at the same time!

> 
> And another 20:02 post!

Could it mean something?

Kerbal Conspiracy Program time.

Pretty cool...

4 days!!!

> 
> Could it mean something?

Yes, it could mean that they are free at 20:02, or it could mean that they need to have the vid rendered by 20:00, or who knows? Any guesses?

> 
> Could it mean something?
> Kerbal Conspiracy Program time.

I'm pretty sure squad's timezone would make this 19:02. It is the same as the one I'm in, after all...

> 
> Could it mean something?

Yes, it could mean that they are free at 20:02, or it could mean that they need to have the vid rendered by 20:00, or who knows? Any guesses?

Ok. So they post at 7 PM. 7 days from the first launch teaser?

Mining Outpost in Kerbins low Orbit, that's gonna be awesome. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Do we have information if there are circumstances (e.g. with asteroids) where ressources are limited?
So what happens when you use a drill on a fuel tank...

> 
> So what happens when you use a drill on a fuel tank...

The tank explodes because it doesn't have enough crash tolerance. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Could it mean something?
> Kerbal Conspiracy Program time.

That's the time of day on Monday that 1.0 will come out! Also, Illuminati!

20:02 has 4 numbers.

2 + 2 is 4.

4 - 4 is 0.

1.0 has a 0.

0 looks like an oval.

An oval looks like an eye.

Do you know what has eyes?

That's right. Kerbals.

Kerbals are green.

Illuminati is green.

Illuminati confirmed?
Ok, Ok, Ok, are there any *serious* theories about why they post at 20:02?
I can already imagine danny making a video about extracting resources from unsuspecting kerbals...

> 
> Ok, Ok, Ok, are there any *serious* theories about why they post at 20:02?

Their clock is most likely delayed, and our 20:02 is their 20:00.

> 
> Ok, Ok, Ok, are there any *serious* theories about why they post at 20:02?

Maybe it's an automatic script told to post at 19:00 local time with either a slow clock or slow internet connection.
That sounds like the most plausible, given that ~7-8 is when the forums EXPLODE with people.
What is that THING between the fuel tanks? A giant calculator? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
Before we figure out why this is actually bad and start griping about 1.0, I want to take a minute to point out that it really looks pretty cool.

Y'know, I think the KSP community is the only gaming community that watches a video demonstration of a long-awaited feature, only to go on to prove the Illuminati's existence. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> What is that THING between the fuel tanks? A giant calculator? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

A new part!!!1!!1
Sweet! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Taking a closer look, most of these parts are original and not just taken from karbonite. Interesting.

I think the laser looking thing (guess its a scanner) is new, as well as the tank (most probably a tank). Those drills (they drill) got a .... facelift. Can't tell if the thing on that tank(s?) is some kind of equipment? The 'big techy thing' behind the RCS is also new, although it's not too hard to guess what it does.^^

edit: Wot, .... is censored in this forum? Come on you aren't even american. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T01:16:04Z" title="04/24/2015 01:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by Temeter**
That's all pretty cool,.,.,. But what is up with the lame music?!
